## Install and launching R packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,ggiraph,patchwork,plotly)
```

## 
Importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

## Visualization

```{r}
plot_ly(data = exam_data, 
             x = ~MATHS, 
             y = ~ENGLISH,
             color = ~RACE)
```
